attributes.action: re-instate the 10p tax band and personally explain his intentions as to why he decided to hit the 5.8m poorest people in the UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the 10p tax band to be reinstated with immediate effect, regardless of whether it was 'totally inrresponsible' to do so now, we wish for the PM to personally explain his intentions on why he felt it necessary to hit 5.8m of the most poorest people of the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
